
```{r}
df=read.csv('Bodyfat.csv')
Y=df[,2]
X=df[,c(-1,-2)]
X=as.matrix(X)
ans=lm(Y~X)
print(summary(ans))
X=cbind(1,X)
ans=qr(X)
Q=qr.Q(ans)
R=qr.R(ans)
(w=solve(R)%*%t(Q)%*%Y)


```
